languages.text: {n}Волки разражаются одобрительными кличами, кто-то хриплым голосом заводит веселую песнь — наверняка про резню и славную гибель на поле брани.{/n}
{n}The wolves burst into shouts of approval, and someone with a gravelly voice starts singing a merry song — no doubt one about massacres and glorious deaths on the battlefield.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Волки разражаются одобрительными кличами, кто-то хриплым голосом заводит веселую песнь — наверняка про резню и славную гибель на поле брани.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los lobos estallan en vítores de aprobación y alguien con voz grave empieza a entonar una alegre canción, que probablemente trate de masacres y muertes gloriosas en el campo de batalla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolves burst into shouts of approval, and someone with a gravelly voice starts singing a merry song — no doubt one about massacres and glorious deaths on the battlefield.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los lobos estallan en vítores de aprobación y alguien con voz grave empieza a entonar una alegre canción, que probablemente trate de masacres y muertes gloriosas en el campo de batalla.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}狼群中爆发出一阵阵叫好声，一个嗓音沙哑的人唱起了欢快的歌曲。毫无疑问，这首歌曲描述的是战场上的屠杀与光荣牺牲。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolves burst into shouts of approval, and someone with a gravelly voice starts singing a merry song — no doubt one about massacres and glorious deaths on the battlefield.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}狼群中爆发出一阵阵叫好声，一个嗓音沙哑的人唱起了欢快的歌曲。毫无疑问，这首歌曲描述的是战场上的屠杀与光荣牺牲。{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}ウルフたちは賛同の雄叫びを上げ、誰かがザラついた声で陽気な歌を歌い始める。それは紛れもなく、戦場での虐殺と輝かしい死についての歌だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolves burst into shouts of approval, and someone with a gravelly voice starts singing a merry song — no doubt one about massacres and glorious deaths on the battlefield.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルフたちは賛同の雄叫びを上げ、誰かがザラついた声で陽気な歌を歌い始める。それは紛れもなく、戦場での虐殺と輝かしい死についての歌だった。{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Les Wolves lâchent une bordée de cris approbateurs et une voix rocailleuse se met à entonner un air enjoué, vantant sans doute les joyeux massacres et les glorieux combattants tombés au champ d'honneur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolves burst into shouts of approval, and someone with a gravelly voice starts singing a merry song — no doubt one about massacres and glorious deaths on the battlefield.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les Wolves lâchent une bordée de cris approbateurs et une voix rocailleuse se met à entonner un air enjoué, vantant sans doute les joyeux massacres et les glorieux combattants tombés au champ d'honneur.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Die Wölfe brechen in jubelndes Geschrei aus, und jemand mit einer tiefen Stimme beginnt, ein fröhliches Lied zu singen — gewiss eines von Massakern und dem glorreichen Tod auf dem Schlachtfeld.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolves burst into shouts of approval, and someone with a gravelly voice starts singing a merry song — no doubt one about massacres and glorious deaths on the battlefield.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Wölfe brechen in jubelndes Geschrei aus, und jemand mit einer tiefen Stimme beginnt, ein fröhliches Lied zu singen — gewiss eines von Massakern und dem glorreichen Tod auf dem Schlachtfeld.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Haykırarak onaylayan kurtlar, gür sesli biri savaş alanındaki katliamlar ve şanlı ölümlerle ilgili olduğuna emin olduğun mutlu bir şarkı söylemeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolves burst into shouts of approval, and someone with a gravelly voice starts singing a merry song — no doubt one about massacres and glorious deaths on the battlefield.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kurtlar onaylayarak bağırıyor, gür sesli biri savaş alanındaki katliamlar ve şanlı ölümler hakkında olduğuna emin olduğun mutlu bir şarkı söylemeye başlıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
